        public SamplingProcess(Query query,
               int nbSamples,
               long maxSamplingTime)
        Creates a new sampling query with the given arguments
        Parameters:
        query - the query to answer
        nbSamples - the number of samples to collect
        maxSamplingTime - maximum sampling time (in milliseconds)

    • Method Detail

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Terminates all sampling threads, compile their results, and notifies the sampling algorithm.
        Specified by:

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the query and number of collected samples
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Thread

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the sample collection procedure until termination (either due to a time-out or the collection of a number of samples = nbSamples). The method loops until terminate() is called, or enough samples have been collected.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
